TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VirtualPathUtility extends System.Object
public ref class VirtualPathUtility abstract sealed

summary.span: 为常见的虚拟路径操作提供实用工具方法。

span.span: Provides utility methods for common virtual path operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供用于涉及虚拟路径的常见操作的实用工具方法。The class provides utility methods for common operations involving virtual paths. 对于 ASP.NET 服务器控件和服务器代码, 使用 Web 应用程序根运算符的虚拟路径, 通常使用波形符 (~), 而不是相对路径和绝对路径。For ASP.NET server controls and server code, virtual paths using the Web application root operator, the tilde (~), commonly are used instead of relative and absolute paths. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 项目路径](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd). 当需要将应用程序相对路径转换为绝对虚拟路径时, 请使用类,这可能是开发自定义Web服务处理程序的情况。Use the class when you need to convert application-relative paths to absolute virtual paths, as might be the case in developing a custom Web service handler. 绝对虚拟路径以文本斜杠 (/) 开头。An absolute virtual path starts with the literal slash mark (/). 相对虚拟路径是相对于应用程序根目录的相对路径, 如果它只是一个波形\~符 () 或以颚化符和双反\~斜杠 (\\\\) 或颚化符和斜杠\~标记 (/) 开头。A relative virtual path is relative to the application root directory, if it is just a tilde (\~) or starts with the tilde and a double backslash (\~\\\\) or the tilde and a slash mark (\~/). 使虚拟路径相对, 使路径与应用程序无关。Making a virtual path relative makes the path independent of the application. 可从和属性获取应用程序的虚拟目录。The virtual directory for the application can be obtained from the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 类不用于安全或规范化目的。The class is not intended for security or canonicalization purposes. 有关 Web 应用程序安全的详细信息, 请参阅[Web 应用程序安全威胁概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a)。For more information about Web application security, see [Overview of Web Application Security Threats](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a). 有关泛型 URL 处理功能, 请参阅。For generic URL processing functionality, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类及其部分方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class and some of its methods. 首先, 属性生成网页的虚拟路径。First, the property generates the virtual path to the Web page. 、和方法返回虚拟路径的相关信息。 The , , and methods return information about the virtual path. 接下来, 如果调用了方法, 该属性将生成当前请求的虚拟路径, 该路径可能与属性不同。Next, the property generates a virtual path of the current request, which might be different from the property, if a method was called. 、和方法返回虚拟路径的相关信息。 The , , and methods return information about the virtual path. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/cs/virtualpathutilitycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/vb/virtualpathutilityvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Site Paths

summary.span: 将正斜杠 (/) 追加到虚拟路径的末尾（如果尚不存在正斜杠）。

span.span: Appends the literal slash mark (/) to the end of the virtual path, if one does not already exist.
The modified virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在虚拟路径的末尾存在文本斜杠标记 (/), 则不会修改虚拟路径。If the literal slash mark (/) exists at the end of the virtual path, the virtual path is not modified.

span.span: The base path.
The relative path.

summary.span: 将一个基路径和一个相对路径进行组合。

span.span: Combines a base path and a relative path.
The combined and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果相对路径正好是波形符 (~), 则方法将返回属性的值。The method returns the value of the property if the relative path is exactly a tilde (~). 如果相对路径以波形符和斜杠 (~/) 开头, 则该方法将使用属性值而不是基路径; 否则, 该方法将使用基路径。The method uses the property value rather than the base path, if the relative path starts with a tilde and a slash mark (~/); otherwise, the method uses the base path.

span.span: is a physical path.
-or-
includes one or more colons.
is or an empty string.
-or-
is or an empty string.

public: static System::String ^ GetDirectory(System::String ^ virtualPath);

span.span: The virtual path.

summary.span: 返回虚拟路径的目录部分。

span.span: Returns the directory portion of a virtual path.

returns.span: 虚拟路径中引用的目录。

span.span: The directory referenced in the virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`virtualPath`不是根路径, 即它不等于根运算符 (颚化符 [\~]), 则不以波形符 (\~) 开头, 如波形符和斜杠 (\~/) 或波形符和双反斜杠 (\~//), 或者不以斜杠标记 (/) 开头, 则会引发异常。If `virtualPath` is not rooted; that is, it does not equal the root operator (the tilde [\~]), does not start with a tilde (\~), such as a tilde and a slash mark (\~/) or a tilde and a double backslash (\~//), or does not start with a slash mark (/), an exception is thrown. 如果传入方法的虚拟路径为`"/images/image1.gif"`, 则返回的目录为`"/images"`。If the virtual path that is passed into the method is `"/images/image1.gif"`, the returned directory is `"/images"`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用、 和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/cs/virtualpathutilitycs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/vb/virtualpathutilityvb.aspx#2)]

span.span: is not rooted.
-or-
is or an empty string.

span.span: The file name extension string literal, including the period (.), , or an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果传入方法的虚拟路径为`"/images/image1.gif"`, 则返回的扩展为`".gif"`。If the virtual path that is passed into the method is `"/images/image1.gif"`, the returned extension is `".gif"`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用、 和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/cs/virtualpathutilitycs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/vb/virtualpathutilityvb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虚拟路径可以只是根运算符 (颚化符 [~]), 也可以以根运算符开头。The virtual path can be just the root operator (the tilde [~]), or it can begin with the root operator. 如果`virtualPath`为`null` ,则引发异常。If `virtualPath` is `null`, an exception is raised. 如果`virtualPath`是空字符串 (""), 则该方法返回`false`。If `virtualPath` is an empty string (""), the method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > `"~`不是`false`有效的虚拟路径,并且为方法返回。 `filename` `"``"~` `filename` `"` is not a valid virtual path and returns `false` for the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用、 和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. summary.span: 返回从一个包含根操作符（波形符 [~]）的虚拟路径到另一个此类虚拟路径的相对虚拟路径。

span.span: Returns the relative virtual path from one virtual path containing the root operator (the tilde [~]) to another.

returns.span: 从 到 的相对虚拟路径。

span.span: The relative virtual path from to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks \~\~\~如果和`fromPath` `toPath`参数不是根路径, 即它们不等于根运算符 (颚化符 []), 则不能以波形符 () 开头, 例如波形符和斜杠标记 (/) 或颚化符和双精度型反斜杠\~(//), 或不以斜杠标记 (/) 开头 , 则会引发异常。If the `fromPath` and `toPath` parameters are not rooted; that is, they do not equal the root operator (the tilde [\~]), do not start with a tilde (\~), such as a tilde and a slash mark (\~/) or a tilde and a double backslash (\~//), or do not start with a slash mark (/), an exception is thrown. URI 中使用的查询字符串参数和 HTML 定位点不用于确定相对路径。Query string parameters and HTML anchors that are used in the URI are not used in determining the relative path. 如果`fromPath`为`"/directory1/file1.aspx"`且为`toPath` ,则该方法返回`"../directory2/file2.aspx"`。 `"/directory2/file2.aspx"`If `fromPath` is `"/directory1/file1.aspx"` and `toPath` is `"/directory2/file2.aspx"`, the method returns `"../directory2/file2.aspx"`.

span.span: is not rooted.
-or-
is not rooted.

span.span: The virtual path to remove any trailing slash mark from.

summary.span: 从虚拟路径移除末尾的正斜杠 (/)。

span.span: Removes a trailing slash mark (/) from a virtual path.

returns.span: 如果虚拟路径尚不是根目录 ("/")，则返回末尾没有正斜杠的虚拟路径；否则返回 。

span.span: A virtual path without a trailing slash mark, if the virtual path is not already the root directory ("/"); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从虚拟路径的末尾移除斜杠标记 (/)。The method removes a slash mark (/) from the end of the virtual path. 如果虚拟路径已是根目录 (`"/"`), 则不执行任何操作。If the virtual path is already the root directory (`"/"`), no action is taken. 如果虚拟路径为`null`或空字符串 (""), 则该方法将返回`null`。If the virtual path is `null` or an empty string (""), the method returns `null`.

summary.span: 将虚拟路径转换为应用程序绝对路径。

span.span: Converts a virtual path to an application absolute path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的绝对路径是使用应用程序路径而不是根运算符 (代字号 [~]) 的路径。An application absolute path is one where the application path is used instead of the root operator (the tilde [~]). 如果`virtualPath`为:If `virtualPath` is: - 绝对方法返回未更改的虚拟路径。Absolute, the method returns the virtual path unchanged. - 相对于应用程序 , 方法会将当前应用程序的虚拟目录路径追加到`virtualPath`的开头。Application relative, the method appends the current application virtual directory path to the beginning of the `virtualPath`. 例如, 可从属性访问当前应用程序虚拟目录路径。For example, the current application virtual directory path can be accessed from the property. - 不是根路径 , 方法将引发异常。Not rooted, the method raises an exception.

span.span: is not rooted.

exception.span: 前导双句点 (..) 用于退出顶级目录。

span.span: A leading double period (..) is used to exit above the top directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的重载使用提供的应用程序路径, 而不是当前应用程序的路径。The overload of the method uses the supplied application path rather than the current application path. 如果`virtualPath`为:If `virtualPath` is: - 绝对, 方法返回不带更改的虚拟路径。Absolute, the method returns the virtual path with no changes. - 相对于应用程序 , 该`applicationPath`方法将添加到虚拟路径的开头。Application relative, the method adds `applicationPath` to the beginning of the virtual path. - 不是根路径 , 方法将引发异常。Not rooted, the method raises an exception.

span.span: is not rooted.

exception.span: 前导双句点 (..) 在应用程序路径中用于退出顶级目录。

span.span: A leading double period (..) is used in the application path to exit above the top directory.

summary.span: 将虚拟路径转换为应用程序相对路径。

span.span: Converts a virtual path into an application-relative path.

summary.span: 使用 属性中的应用程序虚拟路径将虚拟路径转换为应用程序相对路径。

span.span: Converts a virtual path to an application-relative path using the application virtual path that is in the property.

returns.span: 的应用程序相对路径表示形式。

span.span: The application-relative path representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序的`"myapp"`虚拟路径为, 并且将虚拟路径`"/myApp/sub/default.asp"`传递给方法, 则生成的应用程序相对路径为`"~/sub/default.aspx"`。If the virtual path for the application is `"myapp"` and the virtual path `"/myApp/sub/default.asp"` is passed into the method, the resulting application-relative path is `"~/sub/default.aspx"`. 如果`virtualPath`不以当前应用程序路径开头, 则方法将返回未更改的虚拟路径。If `virtualPath` does not start with the current application path, the method returns the virtual path unchanged. 如果`virtualPath`与应用程序路径相同, 则返回根运算符 (颚化符 [~])。If `virtualPath` is the same as the application path, the root operator (the tilde [~]), is returned. 例如, 可从属性访问当前应用程序虚拟目录路径。For example, the current application virtual directory path can be accessed from the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用、 和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/cs/virtualpathutilitycs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/vb/virtualpathutilityvb.aspx#3)]

returns.span: 的应用程序相对路径表示形式。

span.span: The application-relative path representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的重载使用`applicationPath`而不是当前应用程序路径。The overload of the method uses `applicationPath` rather than the current application path. 如果`virtualPath`不以`applicationPath`开头, 则方法返回未更改的虚拟路径。If `virtualPath` does not start with `applicationPath`, the method returns the virtual path unchanged.
